pageContent: Objective: To confirm the correlation between planning and thermal injury of the prostate as determined by magnetic resonance imaging (MRI) and histology in canine and humans treated with transurethral ultrasound.

metaData.source:
Magnetic resonance guided focused high frequency ultrasound ablation for focal therapy in prostate cancer - phase 1 trial
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/29696431/
